game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure in the abandoned temple.
game.description: An old map was found in the library indicating the location of a lost treasure. However, the temple is known to be guarded by traps and dangerous creatures.
game.reward: A chest filled with gold coins.

task.description: The temple is located in the western forest, near the river.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the temple.
task.description: The guardian is a giant spider that protects the entrance to the temple.
